text:
Inflect | Front-end Engineer | San Francisco, CA | ONSITE, Full-time | https://inflect.com

Want to help make the internet better for everyone? Our small but growing team is building products and tools for the internet infrastructure industry.

Front-end stack: React/Redux, Node.js, Next.js, Sass, Flow, Jest. More details: https://stackshare.io/inflect/inflect

Please apply at https://www.ziprecruiter.com/job/114a00e9, or reach out to me directly at jason [at] inflect [dot] com.
